audioFiles.transcript: Un hombre hambriento pide comida a la gente porque necesita comer.
audioFiles.translation: A hungry man asks people for food because he needs something to eat.

audioFiles.transcript: Un hombre hambriento pide comida a la gente porque no tiene dinero.
audioFiles.translation: A hungry man asks people for food because he has no money.

audioFiles.transcript: Un hombre hambriento pide comida a las personas porque no tiene nada para comer.
audioFiles.translation: A hungry man asks people for something to eat because he has no food.

audioFiles.transcript: El hombre hambriento pide comida a la gente en la calle.
audioFiles.translation: The hungry man asks people for food on the street.

audioFiles.transcript: Un hombre hambriento pide comida a la gente porque necesita comer.
audioFiles.translation: A hungry man asks people for food because he needs something to eat.

audioFiles.transcript: El hombre hambriento pide comida a las personas porque necesita comer.
audioFiles.translation: The hungry man asks people for food because he needs to eat.
